product_name: Sanuk Pick Pocket Tutor Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Discerning style and simple security make the Sanuk Pick Pocket Tutor Shoes a versatile go-to option for travel or everyday wear. Billed as a sandal-shoe hybrid from the Sanuk Sidewalk Surfer line, Pick Pocket Tutor shoes are cotton tweed uppers on sandal bottoms. Cotton tweed uppers feature a herringbone pattern for a touch of classy style; subtle stretch gores offer slip-on ease and comfort. Hidden stash pocket over the instep holds your ID, house key or money. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. EVA midsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soft EVA footbeds feature AEGIS(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial additive to help deter odors. Outsoles of the Sanuk Pick Pocket Tutor Shoes are made from rubberized EVA to match durability with pillowy cushioning. Sanuk Pick Pocket Tutor Shoes are vegan friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Discerning style and simple security make the Sanuk Pick Pocket Tutor Shoes a versatile go-to option for travel or everyday wear.
